trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lewiston
There were no other sightings in Lewiston on or around July 24th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw this object on three separate occasions. Once in July 2008, once in August 2008, and once in September 2008. A personal friend witnessed the first event from her home about two miles from my home. My wife witnessed the second event with me in August 2008, and again in September 2008. The first event the object flew low and slow coming from the northwest, low arc over the Lewiston hill turning northeast. Event lasted about four minutes. The second event occurred at dusk flying low and slow right over our house. Again, no noise and no flashing lights. The event lasted about two to three minutes. The third event occurred at 6:30 PM plenty of evening sun light. The disk was flying west to east, low and slow, no noise. Event lasted about two minutes. This third event was witnessed by four other family members.
Summary: Orange disk flying west to east at low altitude, no noise, no lights.
